name: Johannes Kinder
content: Professor Dr. Johannes Kinder - Chair of Programming Languages and AI - LMU Munich Links and Functions www.en.lmu.de Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics, and Statistics Institute of Informatics Sitemap Breadcrumb Navigation Home Team Professors Professor Dr. Johannes Kinder Main Navigation News Team Professors Administrative Staff Scientific Staff Technical Staff Student Assistants Alumni Publications Research Teaching Jobs Contact print Content Prof. Dr. Johannes Kinder Head of Group Contact Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität MünchenInstitut für InformatikPLAI - Lehrstuhl für Programmiersprachen und KIOettingenstr. 6780538 MünchenGermany Room: E 104 Phone: +49-89-2180-9310 Email: j o h a n n e s . k i n d e r [at] lmu * de Office hours: By appointment Short Biography Prof. Dr. Johannes Kinder is Professor and Chair of Programming Languages and Artificial Intelligence at the Institute of Informatics at LMU Munich. In his research, he works on securing software systems using program analysis and machine learning. He focuses on the detection of software vulnerabilities and malware, reverse engineering, and on instrumenting software to prevent exploitation. Hailing from a background in formal methods, he enjoys applying well-founded theory to concrete problems in systems security. Before joining LMU, Johannes Kinder held positions as full professor at the Research Institute CODE of Bundeswehr University Munich and at Royal Holloway, University of London. He was a postdoctoral researcher at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) and earned his doctorate from TU Darmstadt and his Diplom from TU München, both in Computer Science. Conference and Workshop Organization ACNS 2025: General Chair ACM CCS 2019: General Chair ESSoS 2016: Doctoral Symposium Chair Program Committee Memberships 2026: ACM CCS, NDSS 2025: ACSAC, IEEE SecDev, DIMVA, STMUS 2024: ACSAC, IEEE SecDev, DIMVA 2023: ACSAC, IEEE SecDev, DIMVA 2022: IEEE S&P, DIMVA, ICTAC, PriSC, CheckMATE, GI Sicherheit 2021: ACM CCS, DIMVA, CheckMATE 2020: RAID 2019: RAID, APLAS 2017: ESSoS 2016: SPRO, RV, PPREW, ESSoS 2015: SPRO 2014: SAS, ICST, PPREW, EUC 2013: ICST, PPREW 2012: EDCC, SOFSEM, SEW 2011: SEW Selected Publications A list of all publications can be found here or on DBLP and Google Scholar.
